content: {A抱歉}Oh, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, pardon me for a moment. While you've been busy lately, I've been keeping an eye on our new Neighbors.
info: 友邻的生活-莫白_主流程文本3

content: It seems they've just settled into their new lives and might need some help finding their bearings here on our planet.
info: 友邻的生活-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Yunguo, for example, has been so busy trying to grow crops that she's barely had time to get any new furniture, and she just can't bring herself to trouble anyone for help...
info: 友邻的生活-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A挠头}Hoho! <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, when you've got a spare moment, maybe ask our <style=Highlight>Neighbors</style> how things are going and help them <style=Highlight>get some new furniture</style> to make their homes cozier.
info: 友邻的生活-莫白_主流程文本3
